short_definition: The obtaining of money by legal process through seizure and sale of property; the raising of the money for which an execution has been issued.
long_definition_html: The obtaining of money by legal process through seizure and sale of property; the raising of the money for which an execution has been issued.
long_definition_markdown: The obtaining of money by legal process through seizure and sale of property; the raising of the money for which an execution has been issued.
long_definition_text: The obtaining of money by legal process through seizure and sale of property; the raising of the money for which an execution has been issued.
